text:
Interview Kickstart | Sunnyvale, CA | Part Time | REMOTE

http://InterviewKickstart.com

We're a hyper focused bootcamp on coding interview preparation. We're looking for practicing engineers who can teach core Computer Science concepts. We currently have 12 instructors, nearly all from top tier companies. You can be sitting anywhere, as long as you are okay working in PST timezone.

The hourly pay is competitive, but more importantly, it's a very satisfying business to see candidates rise, succeed and crack into great companies.

Interview process involves leading a session and a mock interview or two.

soham@interviewkickstart.com
